title: In the middle of nowhere
content: You will find a little report about a meeting with Jack Usine and Fanny Garcia on the blog SLANTED [http://www.slanted.de/eintrag/middle-nowhere](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011084641/http:/www.slanted.de/eintrag/middle-nowhere). At the end of the german text there are download PDF's available in french and english language. Perhaps someone is interested in.
author: nora g

comments.content:
Hi Nora,

thank you, that was a nice read. Much appreciated.

@David: ?

Here’s a direct link to the English version:  
 [http://www.slanted.de/files/gusto\_engl\_72.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011084641/http:/www.slanted.de/files/gusto_engl_72.pdf "http://www.slanted.de/files/gusto\_engl\_72.pdf")  
F

Thank you, Nora. I enjoyed it very much.

Sharon
